UTME  
(i)  
(ii)  
NTNU accepts any two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Arts 
or Social Science subjects, ND/HND lower credit 
or NCE merit in relevant programmes/subjects.  
PHC and IMSU - no Direct Entry.  
PLASU accepts  
a) degree in any programme provided the 
candidate meets the UTME requirements  
b) HND lower credits in relevant programme 
with the UTME requirements,  
c) ND lower credit in relevant programme, with 
the UTME requirements.  
d) IJMB seven (7) points in relevant subjects 
with the UTME requirements.  
TSUJ accepts NCE in English Major.  
UMYUK accepts NCE in relevant subjects in 
addition to five (5) ‘O’ levelcredit passes at two 
(2) sittings.  
UNIOSUN accepts two (2) 'A' level passes to 
include Literature in English and other 
Artssubjects or NCE in English/and any other Arts 
subjects.  
UYO requires minimum of nine (9) points with 
two (2) or three (3) GCE ‘A’ level subjects or 
equivalent.  NCE pass in relevant subjects/ GCE 
‘A’ level in English Language and Literature in 
English.  
  
ABU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to 
include Li terature in English, English Language 
and any other Arts or Social Science subjects. 
AJAYI requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Literature in English, another 
Arts subject and any other two (2) subjects.
